message: You should consider doing referrals or affiliate linking, especially to things like amazon affiliate marketing. So you get a percentage of people who participate in the ads.

I do use affiliate links everywhere I can, but I don't want to make my blog into a product-recommendations-for-things-you-don't-need-please-click-on-my-links kind of site. It would be great to make some money from it, but it's not important enough to change the feel of the site.

I do regularly get offers for "guest posts" which are essentially "oooh, try this amazing framework (or whatever)", but I have no intention of allowing that kind of content.
